There are a number of tech demos that Iâ€™ve did during the 2020, some were learning projects, some were done as excercise. Itâ€™s split in two Unity projects, one is built with HDRP and other one is on legacy targeting mobile devices.

https://gfycat.com/harmlessbruisedeasternglasslizard https://gfycat.com/admirablepoliticalbettong https://gfycat.com/naughtydangerousacaciarat

First one deals with mesh generation, it asks a user to draw a shape and then generate a mesh based on that shape, which is then put into a physics playground where you have to navigate it through the obstacle course.

Second one deals with mesh deformation, user swings a lightsaber, which dynamically cuts the mesh on the screen in two.
